info.title: Cisco-IOS-XE-controller-vdsl-oper
info.description:
This module contains a collection of YANG definitions
     for monitoring controller VDSL operational information.
     Copyright (c) 2018-2020, 2022 by Cisco Systems, Inc.
     All rights reserved.

Cisco IOS-XE operational state data (read-only).
**Category:** Other Services
**Paths:** 5

**YANG Model:** [Cisco-IOS-XE-controller-vdsl-oper.yang](https://github.com/YangModels/yang/blob/main/vendor/cisco/xe/17181/Cisco-IOS-XE-controller-vdsl-oper.yang)

**📊 YANG Tree:** [View Cisco-IOS-XE-controller-vdsl-oper structure](https://jeremycohoe.github.io/cisco-ios-xe-openapi-swagger/yang-trees/Cisco-IOS-XE-controller-vdsl-oper.html)

attainable-rate.description: Attainable rate in kilobits per sec

sra-previous-speed.description: Seamless rate adaptation previous speed in kilobits per sec

previous-speed.description: Previous speed field represents previous speed for ADSL and VDSL, bit swap previous speed for GFAST

gfast-fra-count.description: Gfast specific field for fast rate adaptation counter

gfast-rpa-count.description: Gfast specific field for robust management channel parameter adjustment counter

gfast-tiga-count.description: Gfast specific field for transmitter initiated gain adjustment counter

gfast-rtx-uc.description: Gfast specific field for counter for retransmissions that are uncorrected

gfast-rtx-tx.description: Gfast specific field for retransmissions counter

gfast-attainable-exp-thru.description: Gfast specific field for attainable expected throughput

gfast-error-free-thru.description: Gfast specific field for error free throughput
